llm_res.rule: Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
Every ERC-721 compliant contract must implement the ERC721 and ERC165 interfaces.
llm_res.function: The contract does not explicitly declare ERC165 interface implementation.

llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. It should not return a modified value.
